text.textField: Double shot PBT Keycaps with resistant shine that lasts for years. Crafted by our engineers to provide grip while maintaining mobility. Increased thickness to improve sound quality.
Available in copper, aluminum, or steel, our plates offer a precise laser cut finish with a carbon infused plate to offer both stability and rigidness.
Crafted with care, we offer a chiseled polished marble material that sets us apart from competitors. It is cool to the touch, and offers a thocky sound in a light package
